0: It is only 4 stories high with an open lobby and feels very welcoming
My cousin and I had fun making jewelry at their jewelry making class in the lobby
This place was real bargain much cheaper than the Hyat we have also stayed in on Kauai obviously the facilities are not quite the same standard

The guests were polite and courteous as was the staff at the reception desk concierge desk restaurant and cleaning crew Location on the beach centrally located so that drives to Poipu and Princevile were equidistant drives from Kapa Kapa is centrally located not far from the airport
Nice facility friendly staff overall great experience
The rooms are big and comfortable the lobby and the pool area are pretty and they light tiki torches at night which I liked
With the hotel fee comes free use of all amenities including towel beach chair and bike rentals and two free mai tais
Staff was cordial every time we saw them whether it be in the hallway at the desk or in the pool area
1: So I went down hall and asked for more
They got into the hotel by walking right through the front lobby right past the security guard
It was clean and had all the normal room amenities but it smelled like mildew
We would have arrived after work was done for the day without expectations of amenities we expected being there
This hotel does not have all the amenities listed for that fee
There is jackhammers grinders and all kinds of equipment
They turned one of their reception rooms into a bar restaurant
On arrival we entered the lobby and booked in
Facilities were at a different hotel
2: The property is newly updated from the lobby to the pool bar area to the rooms
Worth it though for the accommodations and amenities
Brezeway thru the lobby is very different
The wall insulation is good however the connecting and hallway doors are easy to hear through and we could hear our neighbors talking or listening to TV
Did not see any roaches in our room or the hallways
Lobby staff was very unaware and incompetent in their job based on our stay
The tiles around the pool the breakfast restaurant and the lobby was quite slippery
